scripts.seed: rimraf database/seeds/dist && tsc --project database/seeds/tsconfig.json && knex seed:run --esm --env development
scripts.dk-init: docker exec -it directus-app /bin/bash /home/node/app/local_init.sh && docker restart directus-app
scripts.dk-snapshot: docker exec --workdir /home/node/app directus-app bash -c "npx directus schema snapshot ./schema.yaml --yes"
scripts.dk-apply: docker exec --workdir /home/node/app directus-app bash -c "npx directus schema apply ./schema.yaml --yes"
